page.title: 18 L'EREE HOTEL.
page.content: At L'Eree Hotel there is a swimming pool. It is outside and has a slide in the deep end. Around the outside of the pool there are flower beds. From the upstairs you can look out and see the sea at{L'Eree beach. }The Hotel has 30 r0oms some of which have baths. In the Hotel there are two bars. Near one bar there are some solariums and a sauna and a jacuzzi. They serve{bar meals}at midday and they also serve Sunday lunches. In the kitchen they have got four ovens and one microwave. In the Hotel there are four waitresses and one wine waiter. There is a lounge bar, a T.V. lounge and a public bar. The hotel is registered for 73 people. The hotel is painted orange. A brochure shows you what it looks like inside. by{Victoria Le Noury.
